title: The Other Shore
description: When the dead begin speaking to sixteen-year-old Kim Nguyen, her peaceful childhood is over. Suddenly everyone wants to exploit her new talent - her family, the Vietnamese government and even the spirits themselves. THE OTHER SHORE is a delicate meditation on the nature of ghosts, belief and how the future is shaped by the past. Winner of the 2014 Viva La Novella prize.
author: Hoa Pham
